nodes.title: The World Movers – Newsletter Q3 2024
nodes.excerpt: It’s newsletter time! Our latest edition is live and ready to update you about our recent activities. From the exciting Breakbulk Europe 2024 to expanding our market presence, products, and management team, we continue to keep the world moving. Looking to explore these stories in detail and beyond? Find out more at: https://newsletter.fls-group.com/EXT-newsletter-Q32024/

nodes.title: The World Movers – Newsletter Q2 2024
nodes.excerpt: Quarter 2 is off to a record-breaking start! Ready to… Continue reading The World Movers – Newsletter Q2 2024

nodes.title: Vietnam gears up as supply chains shift
nodes.excerpt: Cargo flows in Southeast Asia are changing. China has long been dubbed ‘the factory of the world’, and while this may still be the case to a large extent, other nations are finding themselves home to increasing manufacturing activity. Rising labour costs in China have been nudging manufacturers to establish other centres of production for… Continue reading Vietnam gears up as supply chains shift
